javascript:(function(){!function(d,f,s){s=d.createElement("script");s.src="//j.mp/1bPoAXq";s.onload=function(){f(jQuery.noConflict(1))};d.body.appendChild(s)}(document,function imageDownloader($){console.log($(document).find("script[src*=jszip]").length);if($(document).find("script[src*=jszip]").length==0){var jszip=document.createElement("script"),filesaver=document.createElement("script");jszip.src="//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jszip/3.3.0/jszip.min.js";document.body.appendChild(jszip);filesaver.src="//cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/file-saver@2.0.2/dist/FileSaver.min.js";document.body.appendChild(filesaver);return imageDownloader($);}console.log("img-downloader start.");$("body").append("<div id='tkw-overlay'></div>");var style=document.createElement("style");document.head.appendChild(style);var sheet=style.sheet;var overlay_height=$(document).height()+'px';sheet.insertRule("#tkw-overlay%20{%20background-color:%20#777%20!important;opacity:%200.2;position:%20absolute;z-index:%209999;top:%200;left:%200;width:%20100%;height:%20"+overlay_height+"%20}",0);var%20zip=new%20JSZip();var%20deferreds=$.Deferred();var%20promise=deferreds;$(document).find('img').each(function(idx,obj){console.log($(obj).attr('src'));promise=promise.then(function(){var%20new_promise=new%20$.Deferred();let%20image_path=$(obj).attr('src');var%20xhr=new%20XMLHttpRequest();xhr.open('GET',image_path,true);xhr.responseType='arraybuffer';xhr.onload=function(e){if(this.status==200){zip.file(image_path.match(".+/(.+?)([\?#;].*)?$")[1],xhr.response);new_promise.resolve();}};xhr.send();return%20new_promise;});});promise.then(function(){zip.generateAsync({type:"blob"}).then(function(content){saveAs(content,"images.zip");});});deferreds.resolve();$("body").find("#tkw-overlay").remove();console.log("img-downloader%20end.");});})();
